FAQ.Q: How do I use Instagram Video Downloader?
FAQ.A: It's simple! Just copy the URL of the video from Instagram and paste it into our downloader tool.

FAQ.Q: Will the videos I download maintain their quality?
FAQ.A: Yes, videos downloaded with Instagram Video Downloader will retain the same quality as on Instagram.

FAQ.Q: Is there any software installation required?
FAQ.A: No need! Instagram Video Downloader works online, no software installation is required.

FAQ.Q: Can I download Instagram videos on mobile phones?
FAQ.A: Absolutely! Instagram Video Downloader works on both computers and mobile phones.

FAQ.Q: Can I download both videos and stories from Instagram?
FAQ.A: Yes, you can download both videos and stories from Instagram using Instagram Video Downloader.

FAQ.Q: Can I download videos from any Instagram account?
FAQ.A: That's correct! Any public or private video can be downloaded.

FAQ.Q: Do I need to pay to use this service?
FAQ.A: Not at all! Instagram Video Downloader is completely free to use.

FAQ.Q: Will there be a watermark on the downloaded videos?
FAQ.A: No, Instagram Video Downloader does not add any watermarks to the downloaded videos.

FAQ.Q: Is there a limit to the number of videos I can download?
FAQ.A: No, there's no limit! You can download as many videos from Instagram as you want without any restrictions.

FAQ.Q: Where are my downloaded videos stored after they are downloaded?
FAQ.A: The videos are usually stored in the "Downloads" folder on both Android phones and PCs.
